channel.description: Recent content in iPhone on Al Sutton's Blog

item.title: Is the iPhone 3GS a rip-off in the UK?
item.description: (If you want to tweet this please use the tag #O2iPhoneRipOff) Is it me or is the new O2 iPhone pricing policy looking like a bit of a rip-off? First off, there is the cost of the ‘phone. At Apples WWDC it was announced that in the US; 3G 8GB goes from $199 to $99. 3GS 16GB to be $199 (same as old price for 3G 8GB) 3GS 32GB to be $299 (same as old price for 3G 16GB).
